channel.title: Java Error, need help, Important please reply!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I have recently formatted my computer which restored everything to factory settings and before I formatted I used a program called RSBot. This bot did not work after my format even after I re-installed JDK and JRE. Can someone please come up with a solution to this error? [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2rpenwi.jpg[/img] The Above Image Is Dim So I Wrote It Here: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: C:\Users\Jake\Desktop\RSBot/jar Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: C:\Users\Jake\Desktop\RSBot.jar at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknwon Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> [/code]
I know this isn't really moparscape or client coding related, bbut I still need a working bot so please help me if you can.
Regards, Jake.

item.title: Java Error, need help, Important please reply!
item.dc:creator: @iKilem iKilem
item.description:
@iKilem wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:16, topic:352575”][quote author=iKilem link=topic=448918.msg3296813#msg3296813 date=1281005428]

java -version

Just curious as to what this prints for you.
[/quote]Instead of posting that, go try it yourself.[/quote]
I think you misuderstood.

Disregard what I said earlier. There’s probably something wrong with your classpath. What else did you do after reinstalling java?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Your kidding me right? There is no jar even being called, its reading up to a file, nothing more.

Replace this:
C:\Users\Jake\Desktop\RSBot/jar

With this:
C:\Users\Jake\Desktop\RSBot.jar

Since that is obviously what you ment.

2rpenwi.jpg1600×900

The Above Image Is Dim So I Wrote It Here:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: C:\Users\Jake\Desktop\RSBot/jar
